participant_1.background:
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
i spend my evening creating the perfect music playlist.

participant_2.background:
I am raising my kids on my own.
i am a psychology major.
i am too short to reach the top shelf.
i am angry at my coworker.
My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, just working on a psychology paper.
Oh that sounds fun! I used to major in psychology, but I switched to engineering.
I just found that I was more interested in the math and science behind engineering.
That makes sense. I find that psychology can be really interesting, but it can also be really depressing.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I've always been more of a positive person, so I think engineering was a good fit for me.
I'm glad you found something that you're passionate about!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch anime and superhero shows. I also like to listen to music and play video games.
Oh, that sounds fun! I like to watch anime too. What are some of your favorite shows?
I love My Hero Academia and One Punch Man.
I've heard good things about My Hero Academia, but I haven't seen it yet.
You should definitely check it out! It's really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
